abstract: China’s households hide as much as 9.3 trillion renminbi of income that is not reported in official figures, with 80 percent accrued by the wealthiest people.
snippet: China’s households hide as much as 9.3 trillion renminbi of income that is not reported in official figures, with 80 percent accrued by the wealthiest people.
lead_paragraph: China’s households hide as much as 9.3 trillion renminbi of income that is not reported in official figures, with 80 percent accrued by the wealthiest people, Bloomberg News reports.

headline.main: The Hidden Income of China’s Wealthy

abstract: Agricultural Bank of China has fully exercised an over-allotment option for the Shanghai portion of its initial public offering, taking the total proceeds from the offer to $22.1 billion, making the I.P.O. the world’s biggest.
snippet: Agricultural Bank of China has fully exercised an over-allotment option for the Shanghai portion of its initial public offering, taking the total proceeds from the offer to $22.1 billion, making the I.P.O. the world’s biggest.
lead_paragraph: Agricultural Bank of China has fully exercised an over-allotment option for the Shanghai portion of its initial public offering, taking the total proceeds from the offer to $22.1 billion, making the I.P.O. the world’s biggest, Reuters reported.

headline.main: AgBank’s I.P.O. Proceeds Said to Hit $22 Billion
